item.description:
Buffett and I invite those with or without dogs to join us on our weekly outings.  I am experimenting with this idea so bear with me as I develop a system.

Buffett and I go out nearly every Sunday and welcome company.  These are informal hikes and can be flexible but details won't be firmed up until the day before depending on interest expressed.  We welcome suggestions as to type or location (ie. something flat, hilly, long, short, new or established trail.)

The starting time will be late morning to early afternoon (so I don't have to rush and the day has a chance to warm up...unless rain is predicted late) and can be modified within that range to meet the needs of anyone who responds, in time, with a specific request.

If no one expresses interest for a particular Sunday, Buffett and I will probably just go exploring new territory or trying out routes for future hikes.  I will try to post a time and place on Sunday morning.  If someone has replied that they want to join us, we'll set up a time and meeting place and I will try to post by early Saturday evening.

This is impromptu hiking and may or may not be workable but let's give it a try.  Your needs and suggestions are welcome.  Post to the hike or email me through the website.  I believe I have turned off the reminders so no one will be flooded with emails cluttering their mailboxes.

PLEASE NOTE:  If someone emails me with a request, I will try to accommodate.  ALWAYS CHECK TIME AND PLACE BEFORE HEADING OUT.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Let's get the dogs out!
